lead_paragraph: The president also said that Zeid Ra’ad al-Hussein was a “son of a bitch” after the diplomat suggested that Mr. Duterte be investigated for murder.

byline.contributor: Rick Gladstone contributed reporting from New York.

headline.print_headline: Duterte Calls U.N. Human Rights Chief an ‘Idiot’
headline.main: Rodrigo Duterte of Philippines Calls U.N. Human Rights Chief an ‘Idiot’

snippet: The president also said that Zeid Ra’ad al-Hussein was a “son of a bitch” after the diplomat suggested that Mr. Duterte be investigated for murder....
